name: PostgreSQL Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix and persist the data to a PostgreSQL database.

Variables.Name: POSTGRES_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the PostgreSQL instance.

Variables.Name: POSTGRES_PORT
Variables.Description: Port number for the PostgreSQL instance.

Variables.Name: POSTGRES_DBNAME
Variables.Description: Database name in PostgreSQL where data should be stored.

Variables.Name: POSTGRES_TABLE
Variables.Description: The PostgreSQL table where data will be stored. If the table does not exist, it will be created automatically.

Variables.Name: SCHEMA_AUTO_UPDATE
Variables.Description: Automatically update the schema by adding new columns when new fields are detected.

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka

Variables.Name: BATCH_SIZE
Variables.Description: The number of records that the sink holds before flushing data to PostgreSQL.

Variables.Name: BATCH_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: The number of seconds that the sink holds before flushing data to PostgreSQL.
